name: Cruel
description:
left and right arrow keys to move

x to jump

z to roll

while rolling you move faster and jump lower, you also have a smaller hitbox

to achieve maximum jump height and distance you will need to start rolling immediately after jumping, this is a skill that is necessary for completing the game

if you get stuck running in one direction try tapping the direction you're running in

I didn't want to make a game about being cruel/witnessing cruelty, so I made a game that was cruel in it's difficulty

there's a thing at the end if you do manage to win (it's hard, but possible)
